co.paralleluniverse.capsule

Class CapsuleUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.capsule.CapsuleUtils

  • public final class CapsuleUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that can be used by code launched in a capsule to interact with the capsule.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getAppId()
      Returns this capsule's app ID.
      static java.nio.file.Path getCapsuleAppDir()
      Returns the full path to the capsule's app cache directory.
      static java.nio.file.Path getCapsuleJar()
      Returns the full path to the capsule's JAR.
      static boolean isRunningInCapsule()
      Tests if we're running in a capsule.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • isRunningInCapsule

        public static boolean isRunningInCapsule()
        Tests if we're running in a capsule.
        Returns:
        true if this code has been launched in a capsule, or false otherwise.

      • getAppId

        public static java.lang.String getAppId()
        Returns this capsule's app ID.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this code has not been launched in a capsule.

      • getCapsuleJar

        public static java.nio.file.Path getCapsuleJar()
        Returns the full path to the capsule's JAR.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this code has not been launched in a capsule.

      • getCapsuleAppDir

        public static java.nio.file.Path getCapsuleAppDir()
        Returns the full path to the capsule's app cache directory. The app's cache directory is where this app's capsule has been extracted.
        Returns:
        the full path to the capsule's app cache directory or null, if the capsule has not been extracted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this code has not been launched in a capsule.
